name: Scrap Cargo
description:
Keep the spaceship alive

You are a pilot for the scrap cargo cooperation (SCC). Your mission ist to the bring the latest and best scrap to the OMPK spacestation. So you and your (s)crap cargo ship are on the way to the spacestation. Only ten minute travel time. How lucky you are, but things can go very wrong. One of the reasons could be your vintage ship, another reason could be pirates. You will see.

Instructions

Play with mouse and keyboard! Look carfully what is displayed and don’t get stressed out! Maybe grow two more hands and you will be fine!

Credits for Audio

Music by TeknoAXE http://teknoaxe.com/

Tools and frameworks
  • Visual Studio 2017
  • Aseprite
  • MonoGame
  • Nez
  • BFXR
Bugfixes

We uploaded a second version with minor bugfixes including:

  • Fixed "Difficulty System", so its starts at an easier pace
  • Fixed ending

You can play our original upload too if you want it to be more challenging.
